mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_official ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, name, phone, email, state, image_url, region_id, specialty, work_state, grade_id) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, 'ENABLED', #{imageUrl}, #{regionId}, #{specialty}, #{workState}, #{gradeId});
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, name, phone, email, state, image_url AS imageUrl, region_id AS regionId, specialty AS specialty, work_state AS workState, grade_id AS gradeId FROM b_official WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
